about_the_game:
Details:


In a world where there are only battles, pursue the secret of eternal life and explore the cruel truth in the endless memories.

Game Description


300+ available cards
100+ talents
50+consumables
100+ types of treasures
50+ types of enemies
500+ Random Events

Talent Attributes


Weapon Master: Skillful use of various types of weapons to bring out amazing combat power.

Craftsman: Specializes in creating a variety of strange items and equipment to help you overcome obstacles in your adventures.

Adventurer: Possessing keen insight and tenacious survival skills, exploring unknown territory.

Forest protector: Protect yourself and your teammates with the power of nature and fight fierce battles against your enemies.

Witch: Proficient in all kinds of magic and sorcery, unleash powerful spells against your enemies.

Tower Guard: Specializes in defending on high towers and other buildings, providing strong long-range support for teammates.

Singer: Inspires teammates and heals wounds with beautiful singing and playing skills.

Seafolk: well versed in the mysteries of the sea, mastering unique navigational skills and water combat abilities.

Barbarians: Strong, courageous and fearless, conquering all challenges with great strength and fighting skills

Red Forbidden Army: Strict discipline and excellent combat skills enable them to command with precision on the battlefield, delivering devastating blows to the enemy.

Card Deck Style


Knights of the Bloodless: Symbols of Iron Blood and Honor

In this war world filled with smoke and blood, there is a team of iron horsemen known as the "Knights of the Bloodless ", who have forged their own legend of glory with fearless courage and absolute loyalty.

Burning Cult: A Faith of Fire and Rebirth

In the depths of history, the Burning Cult has become the spiritual pillar of many followers with its mystical beliefs and resilience. They use fire as a symbol to burn their past and welcome the unknown future.

Serpent Shadow Brotherhood: Intricate web of darkness and strategy.

In the dark side of the world, the Serpent Shadow Brotherhood operates quietly, taking shadows as their shelter and strategy as their weapon, weaving unspeakable secrets.

Black Mountain Alliance: An Alliance of Mystery and Honor


In the vast Black Mountain region, the Black Mountain Alliance has become a force to be reckoned with by its perseverance and impeccable honor. They advocate freedom, pursue independence, and interpret their adherence to faith with their actions.

Peak of Extreme Ice: A Sanctuary for Ice Wizards

In the Day of Ice and Cleanliness, a special group, who wielded forbidden powers, formed a mysterious and powerful organization under the name of the Peak of Extreme Ice.

She-Wolf Chamber of Commerce: a symbol of wealth and status.

On the main continent, the She-Wolf Chamber of Commerce has become a symbol of wealth and status with its endless money and vast influence. Named after the story of its founder, who was saved by a she-wolf when he was a child, the Chamber has become a powerful organization that spans the entire continent


Jungle Crown: Guardian of Nature and Healing

In the vast jungle, there is a group of creatures known as the “Jungle Crown”, which is the backbone of nature with great strength and unique abilities.

Game modes


Level Mode: Unlock achievements and work your way through the levels

Tower of Heaven Mode: Unlimited Levels, Challenging Limits.

Email：jusocesn@gmail.com

short_description: Path of heaven is a roguelike liteCRPG.Pursue immortality in a dark world where there is only combat. Carry the various talents you've unlocked, collect skill cards in constant battles and adventures to improve your combat attributes, defeat the final boss to find the truth of immortality .
